data.name: Crypto Tycoon
data.detailed_description:
Ever wanted to manage & build your own crypto empire? Start off small in your own bedroom and pay off your student loan. Accumulate wealth and buy new properties to expand your empire!

  • Manage mining equipment
  • Manage power consumption
  • Manage heat that comes from mining
  • Play the market
  • Buy / Sell crypto
  • Deal with major news events
  • Hire employees to manage properties
  • Buy properties to expand your empire
data.about_the_game:
Ever wanted to manage & build your own crypto empire? Start off small in your own bedroom and pay off your student loan. Accumulate wealth and buy new properties to expand your empire!

  • Manage mining equipment
  • Manage power consumption
  • Manage heat that comes from mining
  • Play the market
  • Buy / Sell crypto
  • Deal with major news events
  • Hire employees to manage properties
  • Buy properties to expand your empire
data.short_description: Ever wanted to manage & build your own crypto empire? Trade crypto and invest into new properties to expand your business.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: T.B.A
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: T.B.A
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: T.B.A
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: T.B.A
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
